title: How Sam Met the Ghoul of His Dreams
description: A gay Halloween Romance with monsters.Sam loves Halloween -- until the Halloween he finds out monsters are a little more real than he imagined. Now he's got monsters trying to kill him, monsters trying to save him, and a meddling witch of a mother complicating things. All Sam wants is to be able to eat his candy corn in peace.Words: 20K complete
author: Aggy Bird
